amendment.description: To require a pilot program on troops to nurse teachers.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4253 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 4253 proposed by Senator Durbin. (consideration: CR S5909-5913; text: CR S5909-5910) To require a pilot program on troops to nurse teachers.
